about_the_game:
The future of Jigsaw Puzzle Technology! Jigsaw puzzles, that move!!!

This demo offers the Daily Challenge mode of this game!

You’ll love this game if your looking for…

- A meditative game to play after work (or at work)
- A game you can easily create your own puzzles for.
- A way of making cool visuals.
- A way of entertaining your audience during a live stream (you can even take suggestions for videos to use in each puzzle)
- A way to play a game and watch a video at the same time!
- A new way of experiencing memories.
- A new way of experiencing media.
- A new way of experiencing Jigsaw Puzzles

There are some hidden secrets as well but 🤫shhhh🤫 don’t tell anyone 😉

The payed version offers...

- Use any video from your computer or from Youtube!
- 25+ puzzles, that transform the video in a unique way.
- 20+ built in videos curated to create especially interesting puzzles.

name: Moving Jigsaw Puzzles Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with at least 500MB of memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card or integrated sound chip

short_description: Jigsaw Puzzles that move ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! This demo offers the daily mode in this game! It's good!
